solution_line_template: The carpenter initially has {initial_logs} x {woodblocks_per_log} = <<{initial_logs}*{woodblocks_per_log}={initial_woodblocks}>>{initial_woodblocks} blocks of wood.
So he still lacks {total_woodblocks_needed} - {initial_woodblocks} = <<{total_woodblocks_needed}-{initial_woodblocks}={remaining_woodblocks_needed}>>{remaining_woodblocks_needed} blocks of wood.
Therefore he still needs {remaining_woodblocks_needed} / {woodblocks_per_log} = <<{remaining_woodblocks_needed}/{woodblocks_per_log}={logs_still_needed}>>{logs_still_needed} logs of wood.
